title: I got a 3.5 on the analytical writing section of the GRE. Is there any way I can improve it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unless you are going for a PhD, this is a decent score. If your retaking the GRE for improving the overall score and planning to work towards AWA to get >3.5, I would suggest you to : Read as many topics from the ETS pool for AWA as Issue topic will test how you put the ideas. To come up with various ideas to support or reject the issue, you need a good base of information in various areas. ETS topic pool and answers to those gives access to required information. Additionally, you might have prepared a template for the Issue and Argument. Look into the template, find any fallacies and improve. Use more examples to support the ideas.
